Text:
you need the version 1.00 first to install this

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8298530/[FSX]_UK2000_SCENERY_-_LEEDS-BRADFORD_XTREME_-_Faro_X_1.01
Many thanks for the upload :-). I take it the original file marked 1.01 is actually 1.00 (and we therefore need this patch)?

@FS_Junkie
yes you need this patch because if you read the first post you see i say i have made a error on the title FARO 1.01 lool sorry its not faro but 1.00 UK 2000 LEEDS

Installation hind: If your PAPI-Lights doesn´t work: Delete the UK2000 Common Library in your FSX-Scenery Database (Do not delete it in Your Harddisk!!!)and register it in your Scenery-Database again. It will help !!!
Thanks, sososo93 ... installed OK :-) ... now to check out those PAPI lights!
